medical_history.chief_complaint: Chest tightness and palpitations after consumption of free glutamate while on modafinil.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began on day 1 and 2 after taking modafinil, including mild anxiety and heart palpitations. After eating a large meal rich in free glutamate, he experienced exacerbation of symptoms, including sleeplessness, chest tightness, moderate nausea, and significant anxiety, which led to his transfer to the emergency department. Symptoms resolved within 2 hours.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 16-year history of cocaine use; otherwise, no significant medical history.
medical_history.social_history: Participating in an inpatient research study and was abstinent from cocaine use for 6 days.
